summary.span: 提供 ASP.NET Dynamic Data 所使用的擴充方法。

span.span: Provides extension methods that are used by ASP.NET Dynamic Data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需格式化選項的詳細資訊，請參閱類型概觀。For information about formatting options, see the type overview. ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何使用 方法。The following example shows how to use the method. 此範例會取得使用者輸入，從已設定為接受日期時間資料的欄位樣板。The example gets user input from a field template that is configured to accept date-time data. 在 DynamicData\FieldTemplates\DateTime_Edit.ascx.cs 或 DynamicData\FieldTemplates\DateTime_Edit.ascx.vb 檔案，方法會將空字串轉換`null`。In the DynamicData\FieldTemplates\DateTime_Edit.ascx.cs or DynamicData\FieldTemplates\DateTime_Edit.ascx.vb file, the method converts empty strings to `null`. [!code-csharp[System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicDataExtensions#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicDataExtensions/cs/DateTime_Edit.ascx.cs#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: public static void EnablePersistedSelection (this System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl dataBoundControl);
.method public static hidebysig void EnablePersistedSelection(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl dataBoundControl) cil managed
<Extension()> Public Sub EnablePersistedSelection (dataBoundControl As BaseDataBoundControl)
static member EnablePersistedSelection : System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl -> unit

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("Use the EnablePersistedSelection property on a databound control such as GridView or ListView.")
System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

param.name: dataBoundControl
param.span: 資料繫結控制項。

span.span: The data bound control.

summary.span: 啟用要保存於資料控制項中且支援選取和分頁的選項。

span.span: Enables selection to be persisted in data controls that support selection and paging.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 擴充的控制項中且支援選取項目，分頁和排序，呼叫這個方法可讓控制項保存選取項目，即使看不到選取的資料列。In controls that extend and that support selection, paging, and sorting, calling this method enables the control to persist selection even when the selected row is not visible. 例如，如果使用者選取一個資料列，並再到另一個頁面，頁面或使用者排序資料，選取的資料列仍為選取狀態。For example, if the user selects a row and then pages to another page, or if the user sorts the data, the selected row remains selected. 如果不呼叫此方法，當使用者進行分頁或排序選取項目會遺失。If this method is not called, selection is lost when the user pages or sorts. 方法呼叫 。The method calls .

param.span: 資料來源物件。

summary.span: 將動態篩選條件擴大成資料來源可用的 參數。

span.span: Expands dynamic filters into parameters that are usable by the data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會展開目前的執行個體的值並控制`Where`可在資料來源的查詢中使用的參數。This method expands the values of the current instances of the and controls into `Where` parameters that are usable in queries by the data source.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Web.DynamicData.IDynamicDataSource FindDataSourceControl (this System.Web.UI.Control current);
.method public static hidebysig class System.Web.DynamicData.IDynamicDataSource FindDataSourceControl(class System.Web.UI.Control current) cil managed
<Extension()> Public Function FindDataSourceControl (current As Control) As IDynamicDataSource
static member FindDataSourceControl : System.Web.UI.Control -> System.Web.DynamicData.IDynamicDataSource

param.name: current
param.span: 資料繫結控制項階層架構內的控制項，其中含有要尋找的控制項。

span.span: A control inside the hierarchy of a data-bound control whose containing control you want to find.

summary.span: 傳回與指定之控制項的資料控制項相關聯的資料來源。

span.span: Returns the data source that is associated with the data control for the specified control.

returns.span: 與指定之控制項的資料控制項相關聯的資料來源。

span.span: The data source that is associated with the data control for the specified control.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例顯示如何尋找包含的資料來源控制項。The following example shows how to find the containing data source control. 在範例中，動態資料頁面範本會複製到 \DynamicData\CustomPages\ProductDescriptions 資料夾為 AdventureWorksLT 資料庫的 ProductDescription 資料表提供自訂的顯示。In the example, the Dynamic Data page templates are copied to the \DynamicData\CustomPages\ProductDescriptions folder to provide a custom display for the ProductDescription table of the AdventureWorksLT database. Insert.aspx 檔案標記變更成加入`OnDataBound`事件處理常式`DetailsView1_DataBound`，在其中方法稱為找不到資料來源控制項。The Insert.aspx file markup is changed to add an `OnDataBound` event handler named `DetailsView1_DataBound`, in which the method is called to find the data source control. [!code-csharp[System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicDataExtensions#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicDataExtensions/cs/Insert.aspx.cs#1)] [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicDataExtensions#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicDataExtensions/cs/Insert.aspx#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Web.UI.Control FindFieldTemplate (this System.Web.UI.Control control, string columnName);
.method public static hidebysig class System.Web.UI.Control FindFieldTemplate(class System.Web.UI.Control control, string columnName) cil managed
static member FindFieldTemplate : System.Web.UI.Control * string -> System.Web.UI.Control

param.name: control
param.span: 內含控制項。

span.span: The containing control.

param.name: columnName
param.span: 資料行名稱。

span.span: The name of the column.

summary.span: 傳回在指定之控制項的命名容器中所指定資料行的欄位樣板。

span.span: Returns the field template for the specified column in the specified control's naming container.

returns.span: 指定之控制項的命名容器中所指定資料行的欄位樣板。

span.span: The field template for the specified column in the specified control's naming container.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例顯示如何尋找指定的資料行名稱的文字方塊控制項。The following example shows how to find the text box control for a specified column name. 在範例中，動態資料頁面範本會複製到 \DynamicData\CustomPages\ProductDescriptions 資料夾為 AdventureWorksLT 資料庫的 ProductDescription 資料表提供自訂的顯示。In example, the Dynamic Data page templates are copied to the \DynamicData\CustomPages\ProductDescriptions folder to provide a custom display for the ProductDescription table of the AdventureWorksLT database. Insert.aspx 檔案標記變更成加入`OnDataBound`事件處理常式`DetailsView1_DataBound`，在其中呼叫方法來尋找文字方塊控制項。The Insert.aspx file markup is changed to add an `OnDataBound` event handler named `DetailsView1_DataBound`, in which the method is called to find a text box control. [!code-csharp[System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicDataExtensions#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicDataExtensions/cs/Insert.aspx.cs#1)] [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicDataExtensions#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicDataExtensions/cs/Insert.aspx#2)]
